item.description:
Night out at Foxwoods, aka our mini Vegas here in Connecticut:

Please RSVP and feel free to give me a call a day or so in advance 305-423-9524/ Andrew, I'll give you the latest details on the event.

We'll be meeting up at Hard Rock Cafe for food and drinks around 9pm.

http://www.hardrock.c...

We'll mingle and socialize - for new members it will be a nice opportunity to meet and get to know everyone in the group. Give me a call 305-423-9524 when you arrive and I'll greet and introduce you in to the group. We'll stay at Hard Rock till 10 or 10:30 and make our way to MGM SHRINE Night Club sometime before 11 so ladies can get in for free:

http://www.shrinemgmf...

Fri, September 17th FRIDAY JAM SESSION feat. DJ COSTA!

Friday Jam Session has quickly become one of SHRINE's most popular nights, as we bring you a great mix of top of the line DJs, playing a great variety of hits and mashups! DJ Costa is one of our favorite residents! He was recently voted Boston's #1 DJ!! LMFAO, Kevin Rudolf and Lady Gaga are just some of the names that Costa has shared the spotlight with!!! Ladies $10 (NO cover before 11pm!!!!))) /Gents $20

Dress code is trendy upscale.


Please RSVP and feel free to give me a call a day or so in advance 305-423-9524/ Andrew, I'll give you the latest details on the event.

DDD
item.name: FRIDAY JAM @ HARD ROCK CAFE & MGM GRAND - SHRINE @ FOXWOODS CASINO
